description:
11.35 colorize
Overlay a solid color on the video stream.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: colorize

options.description: Set the color hue. Allowed range is from 0 to 360. Default value is 0.
options.name: hue

options.description: Set the color saturation. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 0.5.
options.name: saturation

options.description: Set the color lightness. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 0.5.
options.name: lightness

options.description: Set the mix of source lightness. By default is set to 1.0. Allowed range is from 0.0 to 1.0.
options.name: mix
